backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the backend for a scratch-and-win app, with persistent stores for coupon submissions and user profiles, role-based access control (admin/user), and CRUD operations for claims and reward stats.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single feature task: diagnosing and fixing the runtime error in the ClaimForm submit flow, referencing the affected files and test ID REQ-25.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted text file containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a build-planning reference for the project's React/TypeScript frontend.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file that defines CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes (colors, radius, sidebar, charts) and applies base border and background styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Vitalis Water Scratch & Win app, mounting the React app at #root and loading the Vite entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that performs simple client-side routing via popstate, rendering ScratchPage at '/' and AdminPanel at '/admin'.
Modal dialog component for admin login that validates hardcoded email/password credentials and calls onSuccess or displays an inline error message.
frontend/src/components/ClaimForm.tsx: Glassmorphism claim form collecting state, city, UPI ID, and feedback, wired to the useSubmitClaim mutation with inline error display and a loading spinner during submission.
frontend/src/components/Confetti.tsx: Canvas-based confetti animation component that renders 120 colored particles with physics over 3.5 seconds and plays a winning chime when triggered.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmationNoti: Displays an animated confirmation notification card when a reward is claimed, showing the amount and auto-closing after 6 seconds with entrance/ripple animations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with the Vitalis Water logo, copyright year, tagline, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the hero section with a 'Scan. Scratch. Win.' tagline, a bottle image with emoji fallback, and a subtitle.
frontend/src/components/Logo.tsx: Renders the Vitalis Water logo image with a text/emoji fallback and an optional double-click handler.
frontend/src/components/RewardReveal.tsx: Displays a reward reveal card showing the won amount and a button to scroll down to the claim form.
frontend/src/components/ScratchCard.tsx: Renders an interactive scratch card with a canvas overlay that reveals the reward amount and coupon code when the user scratches 60% of the surface.
frontend/src/components/WaterDropIntro.t: Renders a full-screen canvas intro animation with falling water drops and a gradient background, calling onComplete when the 2.2-second animation finishes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including fetching/saving user profiles, submitting claims, retrieving submissions, reward stats, and marking claims as redeemed.
frontend/src/hooks/useScratchCanvas.ts: Custom React hook that manages a scratch-card canvas, handling drawing, progress calculation, and triggering a reveal callback when a configurable threshold of the overlay is scratched away.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind, imports Google Fonts, defines CSS design tokens (colors, radii, brand variables), and provides component-level styles for the scratch card UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays all reward submissions with stats, supports coupon code verification, and allows marking coupons as redeemed via backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/ScratchPage.tsx: Main user-facing page that orchestrates the scratch card flow: intro animation, scratch interaction, reward reveal, claim form, confetti, and admin login modal.
frontend/src/utils/audioGenerator.ts: Provides two Web Audio API functions: a short noise-burst scratch sound and a four-note winning chime, both failing silently if audio is unsupported.
frontend/src/utils/rewardGenerator.ts: Exports a weighted random reward amount generator (₹10–₹100) and a unique coupon code generator in the format VW-XXXX-XXXX.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routes, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear values via sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom fonts (Inter, Poppins), CSS-variable-based color tokens (including Vitalis brand colors), border radii, box shadows, and custom keyframe animations. Registers the tailwindcss-animate, @tailwindcss/typography, and @tailwindcss/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document (version 13) describing a mobile-first Scratch & Win reward site for 'Vitalist Water', including feature list, reward probability weights, admin panel credentials, architectural constraints (pure HTML/CSS/JS, Google Sites embeddable), and known UI/functionality issues to fix.
